anytime: What is hateful to you, do not do to your fellow: this is the whole Torah; the rest is the explanation; go and learn - Hillel
Let a man be always humble and patient like Hillel, and not passionate like Shammai - Hillel
If I am not for myself, who is for me? And being for my own self, what am ‘I’? And if not now, when? - Hillel
Say not, 'When I have free time I shall study'; for you may perhaps never have any free time - Hillel
Appear neither naked nor clothed, neither sitting nor standing, neither laughing nor weeping - Hillel
Whosoever destroys one soul, it is as though he had destroyed the entire world. And whosoever saves a life, it is as though he had saved the entire world - Hillel
Where there are no men, strive to be a man! - Hillel
My humiliation is my exaltation; my exaltation is my humiliation.
afternoon: You're more fun than bubble wrap!
evening: Every day starts with last nights sleep!
The day was better for your efforts.
